title: The Heights Hotel Crag Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, International, Western, Beer/Wine
description: A full bar/lounge serves 100% vegetarian meals with many vegan options. Most dishes can be made vegan on request. All food is in-house-made. Licensed bar with Wi-Fi. Dogs welcome. Scenic beer garden overlooking Skiddaw. Located in a 100% vegetarian bed and breakfast.
